column7: Washington Square Park (Filbert\, between Stockton and Powell)

column6: The dome of SF's City Hall is almost a foot taller than that of the US Capitol Building. In 1954\, Joe DiMaggio and Marilyn Monroe married at the Beaux Arts-style building.
Supposedly\, Mikhail S. Gorbachev has said that his favorite part of visiting America was touring Fisherman's Wharf.

column10: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes

column6: The Tower was funded by a gift bequeathed by Lillie Hitchcock Coit\, a socialite who reportedly liked to chase fires. Though the tower resembles a firehose nozzle\, it was not designed this way.
